oegStart.landingPageTitle: OEG will be present at ChinaJoy 2024
oegStart.description: We look forward to meeting partners who are enthusiastic about and interested in the Vietnamese gaming market
oegStart.b2b:
B2B - Hall W4 - B710
Shanghai New International Expo Center

oegGrid.oegAboutText: Ocean Entertainment Group (OEG) is a pioneer in building a comprehensive online and offline Entertainment ecosystem for Gaming and eSports in Vietnam. With 100+ person team, led by experienced professionals, delivers innovative solutions and top-tier products for partners and users.

caseStudyText.0: National Student Cup Tournament 2023 - the largest eSports tournament ever for the Vietnamese student community with a total prize pool of up to 1 billion VND.
caseStudyText.1: The Viewing Party of the League of Legends World Finals exploded with emotions at OEG Stadium.
caseStudyText.2: Fan meeting of the reigning champion of VCS Spring 2024 - GAM Esports.
caseStudyText.3: More than 1000 'swordsmen' came to the Big offline game Demon Slayer Mobile.
caseStudyText.4: Thousands of gamers queue to check in to participate in the Viewing Party Valorant Challengers Vietnam - Split 1 event.
caseStudyText.5: Press conference to announce the release of Mobile Legend Bang Bang by Funtap game publisher at OEG Stadium.
caseStudyText.6: Big Offline celebrates the 18th birthday of the game AirRivals.
caseStudyText.7: Fierce and climactic 'keyfights' at the National Professional Tournament Finals of Audition League 2024.
caseStudyText.8: National Finals of the Metal Slug Championship.
caseStudyText.9: The moment of Carahouse Esports' championship at the Crossfire Vietnam League tournament at OEG Stadium.

oegTrustedPartner.trustedPartnerTitle: OEG is your trusted partner in Vietnam

footer.address: 131 Thai Ha Street, Dong Da District, Ha Noi City, Viet Nam

oegStart.description: 我们期待与对越南游戏市场充满热情和兴趣的合作伙伴见面
oegStart.b2b:
B2B - Hall W4 - B710
上海新国际博览中心

oegGrid.oegAboutText: 大洋娱乐集团 (OEG)是越南游戏和电竞行业线上线下娱乐生态系统建设的领先单位。由经验丰富的专业人士领导的100多人团队，为合作伙伴和用户提供创新解决方案和顶级产品。

caseStudyText.0: 2023年越南全国学生电子竞技锦标赛- 越南学生社区有史以来最大规模的电竞锦标赛，总奖金高达10亿越南盾.
caseStudyText.1: 英雄联盟世界总决赛观赛派对在OEG体育馆激情四溢.
caseStudyText.2: 2024年VCS春季赛冠军-GAM Esports的粉丝见面会.
caseStudyText.3: 超过1000名‘剑士’参加了《鬼灭之刃:火神血风谭》大型线下活动.
caseStudyText.4: 数千位游戏玩家排队签到参加越南Valorant挑战者第一赛季的观赛派对活动.
caseStudyText.5: 在OEG电竞场馆举行的Funtap宣布发行《Mobile Legend Bang Bang》手游发布会.
caseStudyText.6: 庆祝《飞行队》游戏18周年生日大规模线下活动.
caseStudyText.7: 在2024年《Audition League》全国职业赛决赛上，激烈和顶尖的对决.
caseStudyText.9: Carahouse Esports 在OEG电竞场馆赢得《穿越火线越南服手机版》比赛冠军的时刻.

oegTrustedPartner.trustedPartnerTitle: OEG是你的越南可靠合作伙伴

footer.address: 越南 河内市 栋多郡 泰河街 131号
